name: Altra Prime Syandana
description: A shining garment befitting the Saint of Altra.

languages.description: Ein glänzendes Kleidungsstück, das dem Heiligen von Altra gebührt.
languages.name: Altra Prime Syandana

languages.description: Un vêtement brillant qui sied au Conquérant d'Altra.
languages.name: Syandana Altra Prime

languages.description: Un indumento splendente che si addice al Redentore di Altra.
languages.name: Syandana Altra Prime

languages.description: Una prenda brillante digna del Salvador de Altra.
languages.name: Syandana Altra Prime

languages.description: 适合阿尔特拉圣者的闪亮服装。
languages.name: 阿尔特拉 Prime 披饰

languages.description: アルトラの聖人に相応しい輝かしい衣。
languages.name: Altra Prime シャンダナ

languages.description: Lśniąca szata godna Świętego z Altry.
languages.name: Syandana Altra Prime

languages.description: Uma vestimenta brilhante, digna do Santo de Altra.
languages.name: Syandana: Altra Prime

languages.description: 與阿爾特拉的聖者相襯的閃亮服飾。
languages.name: 阿爾特拉 Prime 披飾

languages.description: เครื่องแต่งกายที่สีสันสว่างสดใสเหมาะกับนักบุญแห่ง Altra
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Altra Prime

languages.description: Сяйнистий одяг, що личить лише Покровителю Альтри.
languages.name: Сяндана «Альтра-прайм»
